thread.title: Eight-year-old niece of Britney Spears seriously injured in quad bike accident
thread.title_full: Eight-year-old niece of Britney Spears seriously injured in quad bike accident

author: jcox
title: Eight-year-old niece of Britney Spears seriously injured in quad bike accident
text:
BRITNEY'S AGONY Eight-year-old niece of Britney Spears seriously injured in quad bike accident 
Maddie, daughter of Britney's younger sister Jamie Lynn Spears, airlifted to hospital in extremely serious condition Breaking Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments THE eight-year-old niece of superstar Britney Spears is in a critical condition after a quad bike accident, according to reports. 
Maddie Aldridge, daughter of Britneyâ€™s younger sister Jamie Lynn Spears was on the Polaris off-road vehicle when it flipped, according to TMZ . Instagram Maddie and mum Jamie Lynn Spears. The eight-year-old was airlifted to hospital after a quad bike crash 
Reports suggest the youngster was under water for several minutes before being dragged unconscious to dry land. 
Maddie was airlifted to a nearby hospital in Kentwood, Louisiana, according to reports. 
Mum Jamie Lynn was not said to be with her daughter when the accident occurred. Britney Spears looks sensational as she performs her first show of 2017 in Las Vegas hot new couple Britney Spears finally goes public with new man Sam Asghari on romantic dinner date in LA That must sting! Britney Spears is involved in a legal dispute over Bumble dating app BRIT OF A RACKET Britney Spears serves up a surprise on Jonathan Ross Show by claiming her wild days are over OH BABY, BABY Britney Spears reveals she is 'scared' about the speed her kids are growing up and dreads their teenage years 
Her daughter was on a hunting expedition at the time of the accident.
